Player History
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Traded from Los Angeles to Cincinnati on 5/18/1985 (Going to LAD: RF Dave Parker, CF Max Venable. Going to CIN: P Bob Kipper, SS Mariano Duncan, 1B Franklin Stubbs, CF Mike Devereaux, CF Fred Lynn).
..
Injured on 4/18/1986 with a Dislocated Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 6/10/1988, off John Wetteland (LAD)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/16/1989, off John Candelaria (MON)...
Injured on 8/22/1991 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for one week...
Released by Cincinnati on 11/1/1991...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/4/1992 to a 2-year deal worth $375,000 per year...
